Class MineField

  • java.lang.Object
    • MineField

  • class MineField
extends java.lang.Object
    A blackbox minefield implementation. Distributes mines randomly and uniformly and the interface only allows access to the mines data structur in a black box mannar. Created and supplied by Victor Khomenko, School of Computing, University of Newcastle.
    Since:
    2014-08-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Victor Khomenko
